actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act so as to provide, for a 1-year period, hospital insurance coverage under Medicare for unemployed workers and their families.

summary.text: Provides for a 1-year period, hospital insurance coverage under the medicare provisions of the Social Security Act for unemployed workers and their dependents on the basis of a month of coverage for each month of unemployment. Sets forth the criteria for determining unemployment for purposes of coverage under this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act so as to provide, for a 1-year period, hospital insurance coverage under Medicare for unemployed workers and their families.
